artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Aritaya Seiemon
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 5/8 in. (36.5 × 24.5 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban) each sheet
marks: on each sheet: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Hiragana seisuiki ひらかな盛衰記, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1849, 5th month.
title: The Actors Nakamura Utaemon IV as the boatman Matsuemon (R) and Bandō Shuka I as his wife Oyoshi (L)
